name: Inner Rage
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Provoke
text: [x]Tradeable\nChoose a friendly minion.\nEnemy minions attack it.
flavor: "Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. I will crush you!"

name: Animated Berserker
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
flavor: He'd be a lot easier to animate if he would just stand still.

name: Athletic Studies
text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: It's a quick read.

name: Blood To Ichor
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

name: Bloodsail Deckhand
text: [x]Battlecry: The next\nweapon you play costs\n(1) less.
flavor: Piracy is technically a discount.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warrior.

name: Boom Squad
text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
flavor: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

name: Cursed Blade
text: Double all damage dealt to your hero.
flavor: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Devastate
text: Deal $4 damage to a damaged minion.
flavor: No thanks, I already devast-ate.

name: Eternium Rover
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain 2_Armor.
flavor: He's all beeps and smiles but you're just a walking pile of armor to him.

name: Fire Plume's Heart
text: [x]Quest: Play\n7 Taunt minions.\nReward: Sulfuras.
flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

name: Hack the System
text: [x]Quest: Attack 5 times\nwith your hero.\nReward: Anraphet's Core.
flavor: Anything can be hacked, if you're holding an axe.

name: I Know a Guy
text: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavor: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\nequip a 3/2 Axe.
flavor: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

name: Improve Morale
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: "The beatings will continue until MY morale improves."

name: Into the Fray
text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "You are in my FRAY!"

name: Iron Hide
text: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

name: Molten Blade
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

name: N'Zoth's First Mate
text: Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Rusty Hook.
flavor: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

name: Omega Assembly
text: [x]Discover a Mech. If you\nhave 10 Mana Crystals,\nkeep all 3 cards.
flavor: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

name: Raid the Docks
text: [x]Questline: Play 3 Pirates.\nReward: Draw a weapon.
flavor: Winning the annual Ratchet Regatta really went to their heads.

name: Risky Skipper
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: Sworn enemy of the Safety Matey.

name: Shield Slam
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Shiver Their Timbers!
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you control a Pirate, deal $5 instead.
flavor: Who knew there was overlap between pirates and lumberjacks?

name: Sky Raider
text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
flavor: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

name: Spiked Wheel
text: Has +3 Attack while your hero has Armor.
flavor: Great for driving, terrible for steering.

name: Spirit of the Rhino
text: Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour Rush minions are Immune the turn they're summoned.
flavor: Where did they get this preposterous hypothesis?

name: Stage Dive
text: Draw a Rush minion. Corrupt: Give it +2/+1.
flavor: The most metal trust fall.

name: Sword and Board
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Gain 2 Armor.
flavor: Stab and Slab. Charge and Targe. Slash and Bash. You get the idea.

name: Town Crier
text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
flavor: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

name: Upgrade!
text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavor: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Warbot
text: Has +1 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

name: Warsong Envoy
text: [x]Frenzy: Gain +1 Attack\nfor each damaged\n character.
flavor: "What do you mean we didn’t give the flag to the Druid?"

name: Whetstone Hatchet
text: After your hero attacks, give a minion in your hand +1 Attack.
flavor: A bad hatchet can make a good spear better.

name: Whirlwind
text: Deal $1 damage to ALL_minions.
flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Alexstrasza's Champion
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
flavor: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

name: Armorsmith
text: Whenever a friendly minion_takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

name: Battle Rage
text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

name: Bladed Gauntlet
text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
flavor: CAUTION: DO NOT SCRATCH NOSE.

name: Bolster
text: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

name: Bring It On!
text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
flavor: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

name: Bulk Up
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +1/+1 and copy it.
flavor: "For breakfast I usually go for a couple of kodo steaks, 5 Plainstrider eggs and an ice-cold milk to wash it down… all raw."

name: Bumper Car
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Add two 1/1 Riders with Rush to_your hand.
flavor:
Subject: Re: Unsafe Rides?


bump

name: Cleave
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to\ntwo random enemy\nminions.
flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

name: Commanding Shout
text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

name: Conditioning (Rank 1)
text: Give minions in your hand +1/+1. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Now drop and give me 5 Mana.

name: Cornered Sentry
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your_opponent.
flavor: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

name: Corsair Cache
text: Draw a weapon.\nGive it +1 Durability.
flavor: Where's a corsair's favorite place to hide treasure? Under their deck!

name: Cruel Taskmaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

name: Dead Man's Hand
text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.
flavor: I got two pair, Rags and Armorsmiths. What you got?

name: Dragon Roar
text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
flavor: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

name: Drywhisker Armorer
text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
flavor: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

name: E.T.C., God of Metal
text: After a friendly Rush minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: There are Old Gods and then there are Rock Gods.

name: Execute
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Explore Un'Goro
text: Replace your deck with_copies of "Discover a card."
flavor: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

name: Forge of Souls
text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
flavor: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

name: Frightened Flunky
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Taunt_minion.
flavor: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

name: Harbor Scamp
text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate.
flavor: Hey, that gnome looks awfully fishy…

name: Heroic Strike
text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn.
flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

name: Hobart Grapplehammer
text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand and deck +1 Attack.
flavor: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

name: In Formation!
text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
flavor: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

name: Man-at-Arms
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Arch nemesis of the Man-at-Legs.

name: Minefield
text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all minions.
flavor: Dodge bombs like you're playing Tonksweeper!

name: Public Defender
text: Taunt
flavor: Happy to defend any public offender!

name: Rampage
text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
flavor: Minion get ANGRY.   Minion SMASH!

name: Redband Wasp
text: Rush\nHas +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Also comes in other colors, but red's in fashion this season.

name: Revenge
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $3 damage instead.
flavor: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Ringmaster's Baton
text: After your hero attacks, give a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: A mech, a dragon, and a pirate walk into an Old God's gaping maw. The mech was too crunchy, the dragon was too hot, but the pirate was just right.

name: Ritual Chopper
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Chop chop, Galakrond!

name: Rocket Boots
text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
flavor: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

name: Slam
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Sleep with the Fishes
text: Deal $3 damage to all damaged minions.
flavor: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

name: Sparring Partner
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Give a\nminion Taunt.
flavor: Come at me, bro.

name: Stage Hand
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random\nminion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Holds everything himself because people wouldn't stop touching the prop table.

name: Stolen Goods
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

name: Sweeping Strikes
text: Give a minion "Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks."
flavor: Infinitely preferable to mopping strikes.

name: Vicious Scraphound
text: Whenever this minion\ndeals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavor: It begs for scraps.

name: Warpath
text: Echo\nDeal $1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: "Left, right, left, right, there's none of the enemy left… Right?"

name: Weapons Project
text: Each player equips a 2/3 weapon and\ngains 6 Armor.
flavor: Harrison Jones was kicked off this project.

name: Woodcutter's Axe
text: Deathrattle: Give +2/+1 to a random friendly Rush minion.
flavor: It's a lumberjack's axe and that's ok.

name: Ancharrr
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your_deck.
flavor: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

name: Awaken!
text: Invoke Galakrond. Deal_$1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: This is an alarm clock you can't ignore.

name: Bash
text: Deal $3 damage.\nGain 3 Armor.
flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

name: Bladestorm
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
flavor:
Dear minions: 

Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh.

Best regards,
Bladestorm

name: Blood Warriors
text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

name: Bloodsail Cultist
text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

name: Bloodsworn Mercenary
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a\ndamaged friendly minion.\nSummon a copy of it.
flavor: You look really hurt. You could use a friend!

name: Bomb Wrangler
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a_1/1 Boom Bot.
flavor: Bomb Wranglers tend to have short fuses and even shorter lifespans.

name: Bonechewer Raider
text: Battlecry: If there is a damaged minion, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: And if that minion has a frisbee, LOOK OUT!

name: Bouncing Blade
text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

name: Bulwark of Azzinoth
text: [x]Whenever your hero would\ntake damage, this loses\n_1 Durability instead.
flavor: This plate turned shield you shall wield, praying its powers fel will serve you well.

name: Cargo Guard
text: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Armor.
flavor: *Arrrrrmor

name: Charge
text: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.
flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

name: Clockwork Goblin
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
flavor: They always wind up bombing.

name: EVIL Quartermaster
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: He trained for a whole year to become quarter-master. Three more, and he'll be a full-master.

name: Feat of Strength
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: Generally happens right after the airing of grievances.

name: Fierce Monkey
text: Taunt
flavor: Fierce monkey.  That funky monkey.
howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Grimestreet Pawnbroker
text: Battlecry: Give a random weapon in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: "I don't know a lot about used GvG cards, so I'm going to have to call in an expert."

name: Heavy Plate
text: Tradeable\nGain 8 Armor.
flavor: "You asked for unbendable, unwavering armor–I don't see why you're upset."

name: Ironclad
text: Battlecry: If your hero has Armor, gain +2/+2.
flavor: With one inch of clearance, Ironclad proved ineffective against speedbumps.

name: King's Defender
text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

name: Kobold Barbarian
text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
flavor: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

name: Livewire Lance
text: After your Hero attacks, add a Lackey to your_hand.
flavor: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.

name: Mountainfire Armor
text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn,\ngain 6 Armor.
flavor: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

name: Ogre Warmaul
text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
text: Inspire: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

name: Overlord's Whip
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
flavor: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

name: Playmaker
text: [x]After you play a Rush\nminion, summon a copy\n_with 1 Health remaining.
flavor: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

name: Protect the King!
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
flavor: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!
howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Rabid Worgen
text: Rush
flavor: "I'm sorry, son.  We had to send Old Howler off…to a farm…to play…"

name: Ramming Speed
text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.
flavor: Her deductible keeps going up.

name: Ravaging Ghoul
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

name: Reckless Flurry
text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

name: Rokara
text: [x]Rush After a friendly minion attacks and survives, give it +1/+1.
flavor: "Tread carefully, but stand tall, and stand together. For strength and honor!" —Rokara

name: Scion of Ruin
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, summon 2_copies of this.
flavor: Ruined! RUINED!

name: Shield Block
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Skybarge
text: [x]After you summon a\nPirate, deal 2 damage\nto a random enemy.
flavor: It's more of a ship-gun than a gunship.

name: Smolderthorn Lancer
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: Here comes “The Smolder.”

name: Stormwind Freebooter
text: Battlecry: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: "Just don't stab the ankles! I want his boots!"

name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
text: [x]After this minion\nsurvives damage,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavor: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

name: War Cache
text: Add a random Warrior minion, spell, and weapon to your hand.
flavor: It's much tidier than Illidan's storage locker.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Warrior.

name: Warmaul Challenger
text: Battlecry: Choose\nan enemy minion.\nBattle it to the death!
flavor: Old gladiator rules: first one to die loses.

name: Warsong Commander
text: Whenever you summon a minion with 3 or less Attack, give it Charge.
flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

name: Arathi Weaponsmith
text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2_weapon.
flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

name: Axe Flinger
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".
howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Blood Razor
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nDeal 1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

name: Bloodhoof Brave
text: Taunt\nHas +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

name: Brass Knuckles
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ngive a random minion in\nyour hand +1/+1.
flavor: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

name: Death's Bite
text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord
howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Dr. Boom's Scheme
text: Gain @ Armor.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: “We did it! We blew up the vault!”\n“You mean the vault door?”\n“Oh. The doooor…”

name: Grimy Gadgeteer
text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

name: Kargath Bladefist
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.
flavor: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

name: Kor'kron Elite
text: Charge
flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Magnataur Alpha
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever\nhe attacks.
flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

name: Militia Commander
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Gain +3_Attack this turn.
flavor: She only needs two commands: "Heel" and "Sic 'em!"

name: Molten Breath
text: [x]Deal $5 damage to a\nminion. If you're holding\na Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

name: Mortal Strike
text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

name: Omega Devastator
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, deal 10\ndamage to a minion.
flavor: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

name: Outrider's Axe
text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor: "I only have to get 4 Zhevra hooves? How hard could that be?"

name: Rancor
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions. Gain 2 Armor\nfor each destroyed.
flavor: Wise men say "Only fools rush in." Wise Orcs say the opposite.

name: Reaper's Scythe
text: [x]Spellburst: Also\ndamages adjacent\nminions this turn.
flavor: Die. Die. Die.

name: Remote-Controlled Golem
text:
[x]After this takes damage,
shuffle two Golem Parts into
your deck. When drawn,
__summon a 2/1 Mech.
flavor: Someone got a little too excited inventing a can opener.

name: Restless Mummy
text: Rush\nReborn
flavor: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

name: Screwjank Clunker
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavor: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

name: Sword Eater
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Equip a 3/2_Sword.
flavor: How tough is he? He eats swords for breakfast! Without any milk.

name: War Master Voone
text: Battlecry: Copy all\nDragons in your hand.
flavor: War Master sounds cooler than Dragon Sitter.

name: Warsong Outrider
text: Rush
flavor: When it comes to the Warsong clan, outriders are the insiders.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warrior.

name: Whirling Combatant
text: [x]Battlecry and Frenzy:\nDeal 1 damage to all\nother minions.
flavor: It's called capoeira! And yes, it is dangerous!

name: Wrenchcalibur
text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your [x]opponent's deck.
flavor: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

name: Alley Armorsmith
text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavor: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

name: Arcanite Reaper
flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

name: Brawl
text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Darius Crowley
text: [x]Rush\nAfter this attacks and kills\na minion, gain +2/+2.
flavor: You either die a villain, or live long enough to see yourself become the hero.

name: Death Revenant
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.
flavor: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

name: Direhorn Hatchling
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Shuffle a 6/9 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
flavor: His mom could beat up your mom.

name: Dyn-o-matic
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions_except_Mechs.
flavor: Star player on the inter-office Boomball team.

name: Emberscale Drake
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: The third little dragon made his armor out of adamantite.

name: Festeroot Hulk
text: After a friendly minion attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Tree puns arboring.

name: Fool's Bane
text: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
flavor: A fool and his bane are soon parted.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Ironforge Portal
text: Gain 4 Armor.\nSummon a random\n4-Cost minion.
flavor: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!
howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Mor'shan Elite
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If your hero\nattacked this turn, summon\na copy of this.
flavor: "Fear not the orc who has slain a million training dummies, but the orc who keeps CAMPING MY CORPSE!"

name: Plague of Wrath
text: Destroy all damaged minions.
flavor: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

name: Ringmaster Whatley
text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate.
flavor: His main qualification is that he'll work with anyone. Or anything.

name: Scrap Golem
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Gain Armor equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: Abuse, reuse, recycle.

name: Shieldmaiden
text: Battlecry: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: She has three shieldbearers in her party to supply her with back ups when she gets low on durability.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Warrior.

name: Siege Engine
text: Whenever you gain Armor, give this minion +1 Attack.
flavor: Wintergrasp Keep's only weakness!

name: Stonemaul Anchorman
text: [x]Rush\nFrenzy: Draw a card.
flavor: "Brug will read anything you put on the parchment prompter. Anything."

name: Sudden Genesis
text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
flavor: Being hurt can make you another person.

name: Supercollider
text: [x]After you attack a minion,\nforce it to attack one\nof its neighbors.
flavor: Boom's Second Law of Motion:\nHIT IT VERY HARD!

name: Tent Trasher
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly minion with a unique minion type.
flavor: "I consider it redecorating."

name: Tentacles for Arms
text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
flavor: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

name: Armagedillo
text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

name: Armored Goon
text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Armored except for non-critical areas, such as the head, torso, fists and thighs.

name: Cowardly Grunt
text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck.
flavor: Cowardice is the wisest part of valor.

name: Deadly Arsenal
text: Reveal a weapon from your deck. Deal its Attack to all minions.
flavor: Oh look. A Gorehowl.

name: Gather Your Party
text: Recruit a minion.
flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

name: Gemstudded Golem
text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
flavor: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

name: Heavy Metal!
text: [x]Summon a random\nminion with Cost equal\nto your Armor (up to 10).
flavor: This metal is so heavy it will satisfy your iron requirements for the next year.

name: Iron Juggernaut
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.
flavor: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

name: Kresh, Lord of Turtling
text: Frenzy: Gain 8 Armor. Deathrattle: Equip a 2/5 Turtle Spike.
flavor: Never should have flushed him.

name: Ornery Direhorn
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Adapt.
flavor: "It's an herbivore.  How dangerous can it be?"  - Famous last words

name: Sea Reaver
text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

name: Security Rover
text: [x]Whenever this minion\ntakes damage, summon a\n2/3 Mech with Taunt.
flavor: Insecurity detected. Alerting hugbots.

name: Sul'thraze
text: Overkill: You may attack again.
flavor: “Griftah here with de Sul’chop. One chop, you get four damage. Two chops, eight damage - you gonna change de way you fight."

name: Unidentified Shield
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

name: Ancient Shieldbearer
text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

name: Beryllium Nullifier
text: Magnetic\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor: Why Beryllium? Because it's hard to spell.

name: Blackhowl Gunspire
text:
[x]Can't attack. Whenever
this minion takes damage,
deal 3 damage to a
random enemy.
flavor: The upper windows used to be for aiming. Then we thought: "Hey! MORE cannons!"

name: Blastmaster Boom
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nBoom Bots for each Bomb\nin your opponent's deck.
flavor: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

name: Bloodboil Brute
text: Rush\nCosts (1) less for each damaged minion.
flavor: Call Gurtogg a brute if you like, but no one else cares about the wounded like he does.

name: Crush
text: Destroy a minion. If you have a damaged minion, this costs (4) less.
flavor: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.

name: Dr. Boom, Mad Genius
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Mechs have Rush.
flavor: "Of course I've gone mad with power. Ever try going mad without it?"

name: Galakrond, the Unbreakable
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 minion.\nGive it +4/+4.\n(@)
flavor: The ground quaked beneath the behemoth as Dr. Boom continued: "…with over 400 TONS of solid Storm Silver plate." Then he beeped a small remote. "And luxury spikes!"

name: Gorehowl
text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

name: Lothar
text: At the end of your turn, attack a random enemy minion. If it dies, gain +3/+3.
flavor: Has been around since before there were paladins and those newfangled paladin mechs.

name: Malkorok
text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon.
flavor: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

name: Obsidian Destroyer
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
flavor: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!
howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Overlord Saurfang
text: Battlecry: Resurrect 2 friendly Frenzy minions. Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Eats more than his fair share of sour candy.

name: Tar Lord
text: Taunt\nHas +4 Attack during your opponent’s turn.
flavor: Tar Lord, man... legendary monster? Aw, forget it.

name: Akali, the Rhino
text: Rush\nOverkill: Draw a Rush minion from your deck. Give it +5/+5.
flavor: Most trolls only get to “AAAAHHH!” and don’t make it to the “kali” part.

name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
text: Battlecry: Attack ALL\nother minions.
flavor: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

name: Geosculptor Yip
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with_Cost_equal_to_your Armor (up to 10).
flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

name: Grommash Hellscream
text: Charge\nEnrage: +6 Attack
flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

name: Rotface
text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

name: Scourgelord Garrosh
text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

name: Tomb Warden
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

name: Troublemaker
text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
flavor: "Prepare for trouble!"\n"Make it double!"

name: Woecleaver
text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

name: King Mosh
text: Battlecry: Destroy all damaged minions.
flavor: He's a terror at concerts.

name: Rattlegore
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavor: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

name: The Boomship
text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
flavor: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

name: Dimensional Ripper
text: Summon 2 copies of a minion in your deck.
flavor: The first dimensional ripper had a point.\nThe second fell flat.\nThe THIRD one really started to take shape!

name: The Boom Reaver
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a minion in your deck. Give it Rush.
flavor: “What’s better than reaving? BOOM reaving!”

name: Varian Wrynn
text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards.\nPut any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.
